subject: Re: JUnit considered problematic
msgSnippet: ... enough frustration after one week of JUnit... wow!  Your experience must have been really frustrating. ... Do you have some web pages/documents/research
messageBody:
> I had enough information and frustration about JUnit/TDD to start a
> discussion.

enough frustration after one week of JUnit... wow! Your experience
must have been really frustrating.

> Many Universities researched for testing methods. Many academics
> don't seem to like JUnit/TDD paradigma.

Do you have some web pages/documents/research papers about that? I
just want to see their arguments.

> Everything must be questioned. Otherwise no progress is possible.

With facts. Questioned with facts. Not rumors or unfounded claims.

-Vladimir

PS: you're still not signing your emails...
